thread.title: Jennifer Lopez to Host American Music Awards 2015
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez to Host American Music Awards 2015

title: Jennifer Lopez to Host American Music Awards 2015
text:
Jennifer Lopez to Host American Music Awards 2015 Comment 0   
Jennifer Lopez will be hosting the upcoming American Music Awards, and Entertainment Online made a list as to why everyone should be excited to see her. 
Lopez's fans should get ready to scream for joy, as not only will the sexy Latina be performing at the 2015 American Music Awards but she was also announced as the host for the event. ABC and Dick Clark Production made the announcement on Wednesday that Lopez was picked to host the show. She was also dubbed as one of the "most influential artists in the music industry." Like Us on Facebook 
Entertainment Online must be so excited of the news that they made seven reasons why everyone should watch out for JLo in the upcoming event. 
The magazine noted that this will be JLo's first award show hosting stint and people are excited in what she has to offer. The singer actress did some hosting in the past that did receive positive reviews. In 2010, she hosted CBS' Comedy Night along with Alex O'Loughlin to promote their movie "The Backup Plan." 
Aside from her hosting skills, people will also be looking forward on what outfits she will put on display. There will sure to be a lot of outfit changes for the singer. This could range from booty-baring dresses to skintight jumpsuits. 
Of course it's also safe to admit that the singer/actress has a funny bone in her. Jennifer is able to make fun of herself without caring too much. Just take a look at her romantic comedy movies like "What To Expect When You're Expecting" or "The Wedding Planner." 
Fans of the sexy Latina are also expecting a sexy production number. She famously gave a provocative performance of her song "Booty" at the 2014 American Music Awards. 
Jennifer Lopez can add the title "host" in the long list of jobs she has. Not only is she known for singing, acting and dancing, but the Latina also transformed herself to become an author and a fashion designer. 
The awards show will happen on November 22 at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles and will air live on ABC. Meanwhile, Joe Jonas and Charlie Puth are tasked to announce the nominees for this year on October 13, ABC News Go reported. 
The nominees for the awards show are determined by radio airplay, album sales, touring and social media. The awards show will recognize fan-voted awards under pop/rock, country, Latin, hiphop/rap and adult contemporary categories. Contribute to this Story:
